ComicInfo.Series: The Lonesome Hunters: The Wolf Child
ComicInfo.Summary:
From Russ Manning award-winning and Eisner-nominated Harrow County co-creator Tyler Crook comes this supernatural fantasy about loss, power, and destiny. Howard and Lupe find themselves stranded in a small town pitted in the middle of a conflict between townsfolk and the supernatural creatures in the woodsâ€”meanwhile members of Howard's cult hit the road to hunt him down.
